description.en:
Governance token for BXH DEX, farmed through liquidity mining similar to other DEX tokens, a certain amount of tokens are repurchased and burned.
Project is a DEX on Huobi Eco Chain mainly aimed at the Chinese market, an English interface is also available. "BXH" stands for "Bitcoin DEX on HECO"
